vsParam:
What's wrong with you, Cresson?
I rarely see you get troubled.

Hmm, guys...
Don't blab, but I am troubled.

Captain told me to "strengthen my will" just now,
but I have no idea how to do that...

Er... Perhaps that's another command he gives casually,
don't overthink it, okay?

No, the Captain gives command for a reason!
Guys, do you know how to strengthen one's will!?
How about overcoming the things you dislike?
Try practicing sword the whole night.

That's right. This is straightforward. If you can overcome
the things you dislike, your will should be strengthened, huh?

Things I dislike... Things I dislike...
Er... It makes sense.

Ah, I had that idea too...
But after thinking about it, I believe I have tried it earlier.

Yes. But I didn't feel much pain back then,
I don't know if this can count as strengthening my will...

Okay... Indeed, if you didn't feel painful,
I think it can't be regarded as strengthening your will...

Painful... How about challenging things I dislike?
Er... Things I dislike...

Ah, I got it!
Things Cresson dislikes... I think it's "animal liver", right?

I see, you don't like animal livers?
Let's make eating animal liver your training!

W... why!?
Must I eat that to strengthen my will...

Ah, getting cold feet already!
This won't work, you know? Cresson?

If you want to strengthen your will, you must overcome the
things you dislike. And the first step... is to eat animal livers!

Hmm, is that so...
I understand. Okay, I'll eat it!!

To become the most powerful knight of Bressisle!
I am going to eat animal livers ah ah ah ah!!

Hehe, that's the spirit! [px],
let's prepare the animal liver cuisine for Cresson.

Pick those fishy and smelly livers Cresson hates!
Hehe, I can't wait to see him eating that!
*Sob sob*, this for becoming a knight... Hmm...
